content:
HTA has registered the following external code system owned by the GMDN Agency. The information on this page has been reviewed by the HTA and is pending review by the code system owner, after which the process to have it accurately represented at terminology.hl7.org will. To comment on the GMDN code system, please do so on a corresponding JIRA ticket.

GMDN
https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=82905257

Thanks,
Carol
@Dion McMurtrie @Julie James @Sander Mertens

Where the above page says:

Canonical URL: https://www.gmdnagency.org/gmdn

should it instead say "URI" (i.e., Identifier)?

Ugh, yes. The page had been originally drafted in the old format that had URL instead of URI. Just transferred to the new template.
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/TA/Global+Medical+Devices+Nomenclature+%28GMDN%29+--+DRAFT
